topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/559333a26368726b98000664#post_559333a26368726b98000664
No; greece is part of the european union and was in discussions what to do with it's deficit, they ruled out more talks cause the european union was being a massive asshole so greece gave the european union the middle finger and told them to go fuck themselves.

It's effectively forced the european union to accept greece's desire to leave the european union or force another recession.


Tl:dr; if greece leaves the european union everything will work out in the end.
If they are unable to leave the european union or cockblocked from leaving:
!https://fancifulnonsense.files.wordpress.com/2012/04/nearer-my-god-to-thee-music-sheet-replica.jpg!

I know a lot of people like the european union, but considering there isn't a centralized bank since greece has defaulted partially if greece doesn't leave the union people the use the euro will almost instantly feel the effects.

It really is fucked.

Options:
1)let greece leave
2)bail out
3)recession
